duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive strategies to manage supplier relationships and optimize the supply chain for medical national brands.
Lead negotiations and contract management with suppliers in alignment with fiscal expectations and performance management goals.
Analyze data and use fact-based insights to drive solutions that create value and accelerate growth for Cardinal Health and its supplier partners.
Build and strengthen key relationships with suppliers, driving accountability for KPI performance and contract compliance.
Drive continuous sourcing improvements and influence internal and external stakeholders to execute strategic sourcing strategies effectively.
Mentor and influence less experienced colleagues, applying advanced knowledge and technical capabilities to manage a wide variety of projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business preferred or equivalent work experience (Master's preferred)
